OrderStatus.name: OrderStatus
OrderStatus.description: Represents the status of the order entity.

ApiName.description: Uniquely identifies a picklist value so it can be retrieved without using an id or primary label.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether this is the default order status value (true) or not (false) in the picklist.

MasterLabel.description: Master label for this order status value. This display value is the internal label that doesn’t get translated.

SortOrder.description: Number used to sort this value in the order status picklist. These numbers aren’t guaranteed to be sequential, as some previous contract status values might have been deleted.
